si.title: முதலாம் தரம்: ஜனவரி 30 முதல் ஆரம்பம்
body_lines: 2025 පළමු ශ්රේණියේ පිහිටි නව සිසුන් සඳහා පන්ති සහ රජයේ පාසල්වල (සිංහල, දෙමළ සහ මුස්ලිම් පාසල්) 2025 ජනවාරි 30 (බ්රහස්පතින්දා) ආරම්භ වේ.

en.title: First grade: the beginning of January 30
body_lines: Classes for new students enrolled in the first grade of 2025 in state schools and government -approved private schools (Sinhala, Tamil and Muslim schools) will commence on January 30, 2025 (Thursday).
